oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Two State of Alabama one dollar notes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These one dollar notes state that the state of Alabama will pay one dollar in sums of 20 dollars or more, redeemable in Confederate States treasury notes. There is an image of the Alabama State Capitol in the center of the notes and on the left is governor John Gill Shorter. His signature is at the bottom right of the note.
